DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to gather data to correlate physiological signals measured by the AVIVOâ„¢ Mobile Patient Management System with the patient's respiratory status, including apnea and hypopnea events, during polysomnography
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with suspected sleep disordered breathing will be monitored during polysomnography and the collected information will be used to assess patient's respiratory status.
DOC.criteria: Is female or male, 18 years of age or older Undergoing polysomnography for suspected sleep apnea Is willing to provide written informed consent and comply with study guidelines
